scripts.deploy:core: cd contracts && forge script script/DeployEigenLayerCore.s.sol --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 --broadcast
scripts.deploy:crediflex: cd contracts && forge script script/CrediflexDeployer.s.sol --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 --broadcast
scripts.deploy:core-debug: cd contracts && forge script script/DeployEigenLayerCore.s.sol --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 --broadcast --revert-strings debug
scripts.deploy:crediflex-debug: cd contracts && forge script script/CrediflexDeployer.s.sol --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 --broadcast --revert-strings debug
